| **Toronto** |  35 |  | 19 | 92 | 82 | 108 | 169 | 215 | 163 | 130 |
| **Washington DC** |  32 | 19 |  | 97 | 75 | 88 | 174 | 216 | 167 | 120 |
| **Frankfurt** |  123 | 93 | 98 |  | 12 | 29 | 242 | 260 | 237 | 196 |
| **London** |  113 | 82 | 75 | 12 |  | 26 | 254 | 271 | 246 | 185 |
| **Madrid** |  119 | 109 | 87 | 29 | 26 |  | 267 | 283 | 260 | 207 |
| **Osaka** |  150 | 169 | 174 | 246 | 254 | 268 |  | 124 | 9 | 293 |
| **Sydney** |  184 | 214 | 214 | 260 | 271 | 286 | 126 |  | 118 | 328 |
